item.title: Power outage at New Westminster Campus - blackboard unavailable
item.description: Due to power outage blackboard is currently unavailable.
item.dc:creator: Natasha Scott

item.title: Unscheduled service outage for phones, WiFi, printers and computers at New Westminster Campus - Nov. 17
item.description: We are currently experiencing an unplanned service outage for phones, WiFi, printers and computers at New Westminster Campus.
item.dc:creator: Natasha Scott
